meanings.definition: A general direction in which something is developing or changing.
meanings.sent1: The trend in technology is towards smaller devices.
meanings.sent2: Wearing masks has become a trend during the pandemic.
meanings.sent3: It's a funny trend how my cat always sits in the same spot.
meanings.sent4: The trend of online shopping has revolutionized the retail industry.
meanings.sent5: The upward trend of the stock market brought smiles to investors.

meanings.sent1: The latest trend in clothing is oversized sweaters.
meanings.sent2: She always follows the trend and buys the newest shoes.
meanings.sent3: It's a trend among teenagers to wear mismatched socks.
meanings.sent4: Her unique trend of wearing vintage hats caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The trend of high-waisted jeans is making a comeback this season.
